languages.text: [Законсервировать алтарь] "Мы зальем эту мерзость тоннами ферробетона и спрячем так хорошо, как только сможем. Так она больше никому не принесет вреда".
[Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."
languages.original_text: [Законсервировать алтарь] "Мы зальем эту мерзость тоннами ферробетона и спрячем так хорошо, как только сможем. Так она больше никому не принесет вреда".

traits.locale_text: [Render the altar unusable] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferro-concrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."
[Render the altar unusable] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferro-concrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."
[Render the altar unusable] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferro-concrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."
[Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."
[Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

languages.text: [Den Altar vergraben] "Wir füllen diese Abscheulichkeit mit Tonnen von Ferrobeton und verbergen sie, so gut wir können. Dadurch fügt sie niemandem mehr Schaden zu."
languages.original_text: [Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

traits.locale_text: [Den Altar vergraben] "Wir füllen diese Abscheulichkeit mit Tonnen von Ferrobeton und verbergen sie, so gut wir können. Dadurch fügt sie niemandem mehr Schaden zu."

languages.text: [Enfouir l'autel] « Nous allons remplir cette abomination de ferrobéton et la cacher de notre mieux. Ainsi, elle ne fera plus de tort à personne. »
languages.original_text: [Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

traits.locale_text: [Enfouir l'autel] « Nous allons remplir cette abomination de ferrobéton et la cacher de notre mieux. Ainsi, elle ne fera plus de tort à personne. »

languages.text: [填埋祭坛]“把这个邪恶的祭坛填满钢筋混凝土，尽可能地把它隐藏起来，这样它就不会伤害到其他人了。”
languages.original_text: [Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

traits.locale_text: [填埋祭坛]“把这个邪恶的祭坛填满钢筋混凝土，尽可能地把它隐藏起来，这样它就不会伤害到其他人了。”
[让祭坛失去作用]“把这个邪恶的祭坛填满钢筋混凝土，尽可能地把它隐藏起来，这样它就不会伤害到其他人了。”

languages.text: [Enterrar el altar] «Cubriremos esta abominación con toneladas de ferrocemento y la esconderemos lo mejor que podamos. Así no hará más daño».
languages.original_text: [Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

traits.locale_text: [Enterrar el altar] «Cubriremos esta abominación con toneladas de ferrocemento y la esconderemos lo mejor que podamos. Así no hará más daño».

languages.text: [祭壇を埋めろ]「この忌まわしいものを大量のフェロクリートで固めて、できる限り隠すんだ。そうすれば、これ以上誰も傷つけることはないだろう」
languages.original_text: [Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

traits.locale_text: [祭壇を埋めろ]「この忌まわしいものを大量のフェロクリートで固めて、できる限り隠すんだ。そうすれば、これ以上誰も傷つけることはないだろう」

languages.text: [Sunağı göm] "Bu kâfirce şeyi tonlarca demirtonla doldurup elimizden geldiğince saklayacağız. Bu sayede artık kimseye zarar veremeyecek."
languages.original_text: [Bury the altar] "We'll fill this abomination with tons of ferrocrete and hide it as best we can. That way it won't hurt anyone else."

traits.locale_text: [Sunağı göm] "Bu sapkın şeyi tonlarca demirtonla doldurup elimizden geldiğince saklayacağız. Bu sayede artık kimseye zarar veremeyecek."
